App Configuration Documentation
SCU_ModuleSystemClocks_CLK001 App

App Documentation

The diagram shows the UI for the App.


The below UI parameters are used for CLK001 table generation.

  • Name URI Description
    System clock source fsys clk001_erwSystemClockSource The App allows the System frequency(Fsys) to be configured from one of the following sources. - PLL - Internal Oscillator - External Oscillator - External Clock Source
    PLL Clock Source Selection clk001_erwPLLClkSource The input clock for the PLL can be one of the following clock sources: - External Oscillator - External Clock Source
    PLL Operating Mode clk001_erwoperatingmode PLL can run in either of the modes available
    N Div clk001_irwN VCO Divider
    P Div clk001_irwP VCO Divider
    K2 Div clk001_irwK VCO Divider
    K1 Div clk001_irwK1 VCO Divider
    Desired System Frequency clk001_irwDesFreqSystem Text box to enter desired system frequency in MHz (Currently limited by dropdown box values)
    Actual System Frequency clk001_iroActualFreqSystem Actual System Frequency calculated based on configuration ( read only value in MHz)
    BackUp Clock Trimming Option CLK001_clksourceconf BackUp clock can be trimmed using any of the options
    Backup Clock Frequency clk001_irwbkupactualfreq Actual frequency of BackUp clock
    External Oscillator Frequency clk001_irwExtOscRefFreq Text box to enter external Oscillator Frequency (default value is 12 MHz)
    External Clock Frequency clk001_irwDigInputRefFreq Text box to enter external clock frequency ( default value is 12 MHz)


    Name URI Description
    Peripheral Bus Clock Divide(x/2) clk001_erwPBClkDivider Enabling this checkbox divides the CPU clock by 2.
    Actual Peripheral Bus Freq clk001_iroActualFreqPB Actual peripheral bus frequency (fPERIPH) in MHz
    CPU Clock Divide(x/2) clk001_erwCPUClkDivider Enabling this checkbox divides the System clock by 2.
    Actual CPU Freqency clk001_iroActualFreqCPU Actual CPU frequency ( fCPU)in MHz


  • Name URI Description
    CCU Clock Enable clk001_erwCCUClkEnable Enabling this checkbox will enable the CCU Clock
    CCU Clock Divide(x/2) clk001_erwCCUClkDIV Enabling this checkbox divides the System clock by 2.
    Actual CCU Frequency clk001_iroActualFreqCCU Actual CPU frequency ( fCCU)in MHz

  • Name URI Description
    USB Clock Enable clk001_erwUSBClkEnable Enabling this checkbox will enable the USB Clock
    USB Clock Source Selection clk001_erwUSBClkSource The user can select an accurate 48MHz lock ( USB PLL) or the System PLL as the clock source
    USB PLL Input Frquency clk001_eroUSBPLLInputfreq Input frequency for PLL if USB PLL is Selected as clock Source
    N Div clk001_irusbpllndiv USB PLL VCO Divider
    P Div clk001_irusbpllpdiv USB PLL VCO Divider
    USB Clock Divider clk001_erwUSBClkDivider PLL clock is divided by this value
    Actual USB Frequency clk001_iroActualFreqUSB Actual USB frequency ( fUSB)in MHz . Note: The clock for the USB module and the clock for the MMC/SD module are both derived from the clock fUSB


  • Name URI Description
    EBU Clock Enable clk001_erwEBUClkEnable Enabling this checkbox will enable the EBU Clock
    EBU Clock Divider clk001_erwEBUClkDIV PLL clock is divided by this value
    Actual EBU Frequency clk001_iroActualFreqEBU Actual EBU frequency ( fEBU)in MHz .

  • Name URI Description
    SD/MMC Clock Enable clk001_erwMMCClkEnable Enabling this checkbox will enable the SDMMC Clock
    Actual EBU Frequency clk001_iroActualFreqEBU Actual EBU frequency (fMMC)in MHz .

  • Name URI Description
    WDT Clock Enable clk001_erwWDTClkEnable Enabling this checkbox will enable the WDT Clock
    WDT Clock Source Selection clk001_erwWDTClkSource The user can select the following clock sources for WDT Clock.
    • Backup clock
    • Standby clock
    • PLL
    WDT Clock Divide Value clk001_erwWDTClkDIV Divides the clock source by n
    WDT Actual Frequency clk001_irwwdtactualfreq Actual WDT Frequency
    Standby Clock Source Selection clk001_erwSTDBYClkSource The user can select the following as Standby clock sources.
    • Ultra Low Power Oscillator
    • Internal Slow Clock


  • Name URI Description
    Enable External Clock Feature clk001_erwEnableExtClk Enabling this checkbox will reserve a Pin resouce to watch clock externally
    Clock Source for external observation clk001_erwExtClkSrc The user can select the following clock sources.
    • System Clock
    • USB Clock
    • PLL Clock
    Clock Divide Value clk001_erwExtClkPLLDiv Divides the PLL/USB clock source by n.
    Pad Driver Strength clk001_erwExtClkPadDriverMode The user can configure the pad driver strength




Note: EBU and SDMMC modules are unavailable in XMC44xx and XMC42xx devices
